mapper.select:
/* 1 대 1 문의게시판 답변게시글 조회 */ SELECT ir.inquiry_re_board_code ,ir.user_id ,ir.inquiry_re_board_title ,ir.inquiry_re_board_content ,ir.inquiry_board_re_reg_time ,u.user_nickname FROM tb_inquiry_re_board AS ir INNER JOIN tb_user AS u ON
ir.user_id = u.user_id WHERE ir.inquiry_re_board_code = #{inquiryReBoardCode};

/* 1 대 1 문의게시판 문의게시글 조회 */ SELECT ib.inquiry_board_code ,ib.user_id ,ib.inquiry_board_title ,ib.inquiry_board_content ,ib.inquiry_board_type ,ib.inquiry_board_reg_time ,u.user_nickname FROM tb_inquiry_board AS ib INNER JOIN tb_user AS u ON ib.user_id = u.user_id WHERE ib.inquiry_board_code = #{inquiryBoardCode};

/* 1 대 1 문의게시판 답글 목록 조회 */ SELECT ir.inquiry_re_board_code ,ir.user_id ,ir.inquiry_board_code ,ir.inquiry_re_board_title ,ir.inquiry_re_board_content ,ir.inquiry_board_re_reg_time ,u.user_nickname FROM tb_inquiry_re_board AS ir INNER JOIN tb_user AS u ON ir.user_id = u.user_id;

/* 1 대 1 문의게시판 목록 조회 */ SELECT ib.inquiry_board_code ,ib.user_id ,ib.inquiry_board_title ,ib.inquiry_board_content ,ib.inquiry_board_type ,ib.inquiry_board_reg_time ,u.user_nickname FROM tb_inquiry_board AS ib INNER JOIN tb_user AS u ON ib.user_id = u.user_id WHERE not ib.inquiry_board_type='답글' ORDER BY LENGTH(SUBSTRING(inquiry_board_code,14)) DESC,SUBSTRING(inquiry_board_code,14) DESC
LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{pageSize};
